Verses: 1 idharkuppinbu Dhaaveedhin Kumaaranaagiya Apsalomukkuth Thaamaar Ennum Perulla Savundhariyamulla Oru Sagodhari Irundhaal; Avalmel Dhaaveedhin Kumaaran Amnon Mogamkondaan.
2 than Sagodhariyaagiya Thaamaarinimiththam Ekkankondu Vyaadhippattaan; Aval Kanniyaasthreeyaayirundhaal; Avalukkup Pollaappu Seyya, Amnonukku Varuththamaaik Kandadhu.
3 amnonukku Dhaaveedhudaiya Thamaiyan Simiyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Yonadhaap Ennum Perulla Oru Snegidhan Irundhaan; Andha Yonadhaap Magaa Thandhiravaadhi.

4 avan Ivanaip Paarththu: Raajakumaaranaagiya Nee, Naalukkunaal Edhinaale Ippadi Melindhupogiraai, Enakkuchchollamaattaayaa Endraan. Adharku Amnon: En Sagodharan Apsalomin Sagodhariyaagiya Thaamaarinmel Naan Aasaivaiththirukkiren Endraan.

5 appozhudhu Yonadhaap Avanaippaarththu: Nee Vyaadhikkaaranaippola Unpadukkaiyinmel Paduththukkol; Unnaip Paarkkiradharku Un Thagappanaar Varumpodhu, Nee, En Sagodhariyaagiya Thaamaar Vandhu, Enakkup Pojanamkoduththu, Aval Kaiyinaale Saappidumpadikku Naan Paarkka, En Kangalukku Munbaaga Samaikkumpadi Dhayavuseyyavendum Endru Sol Endraan.

6 appadiye Amnon Vyaadhikkaaranpol Paduththukkondu, Raajaa Thannaip Paarkkavandhapodhu, Raajaavai Nokki: En Sagodhariyaagiya Thaamaar Vandhu Naan Aval Kaiyinaale Saappidumpadikku, En Kangalukku Munbaaga Irandu Nalla Paniyaarangalaip Pannumpadi Uththaravu Kodukkavendum Endraan.
7 appozhudhu Dhaaveedhu: Veettukkuth Thaamaaridaththil Aal Anuppi, Nee Un Sagodharanaagiya Amnon Veettukkuppoi, Avanukku Samaiyal Pannikkodu Endru Solla Sonnaan.
8 thaamaar Than Sagodharanaagiya Amnon Paduththukkondirukkira Veettukkup Poi, Maaveduththup Pisaindhu, Avan Kangalukku Munbaagath Thatti Paniyaarangalai Suttu,
9 sattiyai Eduththu, Avanukku Munbaaga Avaigalai Vaiththaal; Aanaalum Avan Saappidamaatten Endraan; Pinbu Amnon Ellaarum Ennaivittu Veliye Pogattum Endraan; Ellaarum Avanai Vittu Veliye Ponaargal.

10 appozhudhu Amnon Thaamaaraippaarththu: Naan Un Kaiyinaale Saappidumpadikku, Andhap Palagaaraththai Araiveettile Konduvaa Endraan; Appadiye Thaamaar Thaan Seydha Paniyaarangalai Araiveettil Irukkira Than Sagodharanaagiya Amnonidaththil Konduponaal.
11 avan Saappidumpadikku Aval Avaigalaik Kitta Konduvarugaiyil, Avan Avalaip Pidiththu, Avalaip Paarththu: En Sagodhariye, Nee Vandhu Ennode Sayani Endraan.
12 adharku Aval: Vendaam, En Sagodharane, Ennai Avamaanappaduththaadhe, Isravelile Ippadi Seyyaththagaadhu; Ippadippatta Madhikedaana Kaariyaththai Seyyavendaam.
13 naan En Vetkaththode Enge Poven? Neeyum Isravelile Madhikettavargalil Oruvanaippola Aavaai; Ippodhum Nee Raajaavode Pesu, Avar Ennai Unakkuth Tharaamal Marukkamaattaar Endraal.
14 avan Aval Sollaik Ketkamaatten Endru Avalai Balavandhamaaip Pidiththu, Avalode Sayaniththu, Avalaik Karpazhiththaan.

15 pirpaadu Amnon Avalai Migavum Veruththaan; Avan Avalai Virumbina Viruppaththaip Paarkkilum, Avalai Veruththa Veruppu Adhigamaayirundhadhu. Aagaiyaal: Nee Ezhundhu Poividu Endru Amnon Avalode Sonnaan.

16 appozhudhu Aval: Nee Enakku Mundhi Seydha Anyaayaththaippaarkkilum, Ippozhudhu Ennaith Thuraththividugira Andha Anyaayam Kodumaiyaayirukkiradhu Endraal; Aanaalum Avan Aval Sollaik Ketka Manadhillaamal,
17 thannidaththil Sevikkira Than Velaikkaaranaik Kooppittu: Nee Ivalai, Ennai Vittu Veliye Thalli, Kadhavaippoottu Endraan.

18 appadiye Avanidaththil Sevikkiravan Avalai Veliye Thalli, Kadhavaip Poottinaan; Aval Palavarunamaana Vasthiraththai Uduththikkondirundhaal; Raajakumaaraththigalaagiya Kannigaigal Ippadikkoththa, Saalvaigalaith Thariththukkolvaargal.

19 appozhudhu Thaamaar: Than Thalaiyinmel Saambalai Vaarippottukkondu, Thaan Thariththirundha Palavarunamaana Vasthiraththaik Kizhiththu, Than Kaiyaith Than Thalaiyinmel Vaiththu, Saththamittu Azhudhukonduponaal.

20 appozhudhu Aval Sagodharanaagiya Apsalom Avalaip Paarththu: Un Sagodharanaagiya Amnon Unnodirundhaano? Ippodhum En Sagodhariye, Nee Mavunamaayiru; Avan Unnudaiya Sagodharan; Indhak Kaariyaththai Unmanadhile Vaikkaadhe Endraan; Appadiye Thaamaar Than Sagodharanaagiya Apsalomin Veettil Thaniththuk Kilesappattukkondirundhaal.
21 dhaaveedhuraajaa Indha Seydhigalaiyellaam Kelvippattapodhu, Vegu Kobamaayerindhaan.
22 apsalom Amnonode Nanmaiyaagilum Theemaiyaagilum Pesavillai; Than Sagodhariyaagiya Thaamaarai Amnon Karpazhiththa Kaariyaththinimiththam Apsalom Avanaip Pagaiththaan.

23 irandu Varusham Sendrapinbu, Apsalom Eppiraayeemukku Sameebamaana Paalaadhsorile Aatkalai Vaiththu, Aadugalai Mayirkaththarikkira Velaiyil Irundhaan; Ange Raajakumaarar Ellaaraiyum Virundhukku Azhaiththaan.
24 avan Raajaavinidaththil Poi, Aatkalai Vaiththu Aadugalai Mayirkaththarikkiren; Raajaavum Avarudaiya Oozhiyakkaararum Umadhu Adiyaanode Varumpadivendikkollugiren Endraan.

25 raajaa Apsalomaip Paarththu: Appadi Vendaam, En Magane; Naangal Ellaarum Varuvomaagil Unakku Veguselavundaagum Endraan; Avanai Varundhikkettaalum, Avan Poga Manadhillaamal, Avanai Aaseervadhiththaan.
26 appozhudhu Apsalom: Adhu Koodaadhirundhaal, En Sagodharanaagiya Amnonaavadhu Engalode Varumpadi Avanukku Uththaravu Seyyum Endraan. Adharku Raajaa: Avan Unnode Varavendiyadhu Enna Endraan.
27 apsalom Pinnaiyum Avanai Varundhik Kettukkondapadiyinaal, Avan Amnonaiyum, Raajaavin Kumaarar Anaivaraiyum Avanode Pogavittaan.

28 apsalom Than Velaikkaararai Nokki: Amnon Dhraatcharasam Kudiththuk Kaliththirukkum Samayaththai Nandraaip Paarththirungal; Appozhudhu Naan: Amnonai Adiyungal Endru Solluven, Udane Neengal Bayappadaamal Avanaik Kondrupodungal; Naan Allavo Adhai Ungalukkuk Kattalaiyidugiren; Thidankondu Dhairiyamaayirungal Endru Solliyirundhaan.
29 apsalom Karpiththapadiye Apsalomin Velaikkaarar Amnonukku Seydhaargal; Appozhudhu Raajakumaarar Ellaarum Ezhundhirundhu, Avaravar Thamtham Koveru Kazhudhaiyinmel Eri Odipponaargal.
30 avargal Vazhiyil Irukkirapodhe, Apsalom Raajakumaararaiyellaam Adiththuk Kondrupottaan, Avargalil Oruvarum Meendhirukka Vidavillai Engiradhaai, Dhaaveedhukku Seydhi Vandhadhu.
31 appozhudhu Raajaa Ezhundhirundhu, Than Vasthirangalaik Kizhiththukkondu, Tharaiyile Vizhundhukidandhaan; Avan Oozhiyakkaarar Ellaarum Thangal Vasthirangalaik Kizhiththukkondu Nindraargal.

32 appozhudhu Dhaaveedhin Thamaiyanaagiya Simiyaavin Kumaaran Yonadhaap Vandhu: Raajakumaararaana Vaalibaraiyellaam Kondrupottaargal Endru En Aandavan Ninaikkavendaam; Amnonmaaththiram Seththupponaan; Avan Than Sagodhariyaagiya Thaamaaraik Karpazhiththa Naalmudharkondu, Adhu Apsalomin Nenjil Irundhadhu.
33 ippodhum Raajakumaarargal Ellaarum Seththaargal Engira Pechchai Raajaavaagiya En Aandavan Thammudaiya Manadhile Vaikkavendaam; Amnon Oruvane Seththaan Endraan; Apsalom Odipponaan.
34 jaamakkaara Sevagan Than Kangalai Ereduththup Paarththapodhu, Idho, Anegam Janangal Thanakkup Pinnaale Malai Oramaai Varugiradhaik Kandaan.
35 appozhudhu Yonadhaap Raajaavaip Paarththu: Idho, Raajakumaarar Varugiraargal; Umadhu Adiyen Sonnapadiye Aayitru Endraan.
36 avan Pesi Mudindhapodhu, Raajakumaarar Vandhu, Saththamittu Azhudhaargal; Raajaavum Avanudaiya Ellaa Oozhiyakkaararum Migavum Pulambi Azhudhaargal.
37 apsalomo Ammiyoodhin Kumaaranaagiya Thalmaai Ennum Kesoorin Raajaavinidaththirku Odipponaan. Dhaaveedhu Dhinandhorum Than Kumaaranukkaaga Dhukkiththukkondirundhaan.
38 apsalom Kesoorukku Odippoi, Ange Moondru Varusham Irundhaan.
39 dhaaveedhuraajaa Amnon Seththapadiyinaal, Avanukkaaga Dhukkiththu Aarudhaladaindhapodhu Apsalomaip Pinthodarum Ninaivai Vittuvittaan.
